@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Well I figured that, but I didn’t know what to change it to… and you said to edit it… not how…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 01:35:57 PM[/size][hr]I don’t wanna argue any more… so thank you.

item.source: How the hell would I change this?

item.title: How the hell would I change this?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:15, topic:117710”]Are people in this community that stupid … i told you how to fix edit the dam case

case 17: //Thieving sendFrame164(4261); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", 6262); sendFrame126("Your theiving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 6263); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[17] >= 99) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[17] +" thieving!"); } break;

if you had half a brain you would have noticed (put in quotes so i can bold)

[quote]case 17: //Thieving
sendFrame164(4261);
stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!”, 6262);
sendFrame126(“Your theiving level is now “+playerLevel[17]+” .”, 6263);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level.”);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
if (playerLevel[17] >= 99) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten “+ playerLevel[17] +” thieving!");
}
break;[/quote]

then you would have thought omg it isn’t sending the text to the right interface i’d better fix it and you would have changed

sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", 6262);

to

sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", 4263);

and

sendFrame126("Your theiving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 6263);

to

sendFrame126("Your theiving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 4264);

Read full topic

item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

You told me to edit it stupid fuck… you didn’t tell me how…

ownage plz:

find case 17: //Thieving and edit the case

Shall I post any more proof?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 01:27:16 PM[/size][hr]And all you did was add [b]'s and [/b]'s.........

Read full topic

item.title: How the hell would I change this?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Are people in this community that stupid … i told you how to fix edit the dam case

case 17: //Thieving sendFrame164(4261); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", 6262); sendFrame126("Your theiving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 6263); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[17] >= 99) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[17] +" thieving!"); } break;

if you had half a brain you would have noticed (put in quotes so i can bold)

case 17: //Thieving sendFrame164([b]4261[/b]); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", [b]6262[/b]); sendFrame126("Your theiving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", [b]6263[/b]); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[17] >= 99) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[17] +" thieving!"); } break;

then you would have thought omg it isn’t sending the text to the right interface i’d better fix it and you would have changed

sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", 6262);

to

sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", 4263);

and

sendFrame126("Your theiving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 6263);

to

sendFrame126("Your theiving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 4264);

Read full topic

This is what I have for case 17…

case 17: //Thieving sendFrame164(4261); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", 6262); sendFrame126("Your theiving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 6263); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[17] >= 99) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[17] +" thieving!"); } break;

But it still has the Line1 Line2 thing…

item.title: How the hell would I change this?
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

I added a theiving stall to my server, but when you steal from it this comes up…

How do I change the circled part?

line1.jpg1024×768

I searched in like 5 different things for “line1”, nothing showed up…

Here’s what I found for case 17: //thieving

case 17: //Thieving sendFrame164(4261); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", 6262); sendFrame126("Your theiving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 6263); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[17] >= 99) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[17] +" thieving!"); } break;

Read full topic
